# configuration

**Instance Property**

The configuration of the custom tool item.

## Declaration

```swift
var configuration: PKToolPickerCustomItem.Configuration { get }
```

## Configuring the custom item

- **color**: The current color of the custom tool item.
- **width**: The current width of the custom tool item.
- **PKToolPickerCustomItem.Configuration**: A configuration that specifies the appearance and behavior of a custom tool item and its contents.
